import {Component, Input} from '@angular/core'; import {Tariff} from "../../shared/models/tarifs"; @Component({ selector: 'app-tariff-list', templateUrl: './tariff-list.component.html', styleUrls: ['./tariff-list.component.sass'] }) export class TariffListComponent { @Input() tariffs: Tariff[] = []; }
